content:
Here is a flowchart outlining the process for importing a motor vehicle from the UK:
```
[Start]
  |
  | (Is the vehicle being imported from Northern Ireland?)
  |
  +----Yes----------------------------+
  |                                  |
  | (Are the vehicle and its owner both in Northern Ireland prior to 1/1/2021?)
  |                                  |
  |                                  +----Yes-------------------------+
  |                                  |                              |
  |                                  | (No customs formalities or    |
  |                                  |  VAT on import or customs   |
  |                                  |  duty are required)         |
  |                                  |                              |
  |                                  +----No------------------------+
  |                                                                |
  | (Customs formalities and VAT on import may apply)               |
  |                                                                |
  +----No----------------------------+                              |
  |                                  |                              |
  | (Is the importer registered for   |                              |
  |  Revenue Online Service (ROS) and|                              |
  |  Customs & Excise?)              |                              |
  |                                  |                              |
  |                                  +----Yes-----------------------+
  |                                  |                             |
  | (Can the importer complete the   |                             |
  |  Customs import declaration?)    |                             |
  |                                  |                             |
  |                                  +----Yes----------------------+
  |                                  |                            |
  | (Complete Customs import         |                            |
  |  declaration)                    |                            |
  |                                  |                            |
  |                                  +----No---------------------+
  |                                                             |
  | (Have a customs agent complete   |                            |
  |  the Customs import declaration) |                            |
  |                                  |                            |
  |                                  +---------------------------+
  |
  | (Is the vehicle UK origin?)
  |
  +----Yes----------------------------+
  |                                  |
  | (No Customs Duty is required)    |
  |                                  |
  +----No----------------------------+
  |                                  |
  | (Calculate and pay Customs Duty) |
  |                                  |
  |                                  +---------------------------+
  |
  | (Calculate and pay VAT on import)
  |
  +---------------------------+
  |
[End]
```
I hope this helps! Please let me know if you have any questions or need further clarification.
